name: Parsona AR Application
description:
This is the upload of an application that I created for my final year group project in University.  It is an augmented reality avatar creation application that allows users to create a virtual persona with the numerous styles and clothing options, and then spawn the character to a plane using the Vueforia plugin for Unity. All assets are of my own creation except for the icon pack.

Link to Demo Video: 

Credit to my Group member Eryk Kowalewicz for UI + Icon Design.
